snippet.title: of the Devil - Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2739630/of_the_Devil/
"Every good attorney keeps an ace up their sleeve."

Dripping with cyberpunk atmosphere and flush with high-stakes legal gambles, of the Devil is now available for Wishlisting on Steam!

Featuring:
-Collectible Profiles on the characters you encounter
-A log of all Evidence and Key Terms you come across that you can access from your phone at any time
-Dynamic and cinematic camera movement during Dialogue and Investigation scenes
-A Credit system where your ability to gather facts and leverage them in conversation is measured as your in-game HP
-Unlockable dialogue choices available only for the most astute of investigators
-Bonus scenarios unlocked based on how well you perform during each case
-An Ante system that lets you wager more or less of your HP based on how confident you are in your answers

And our brand-new Gamble gameplay system! Combining logical deductions, argumentative reasoning and high-stakes poker, players must read their opponent's arguments and choose the best answer from the facts they've gathered in their hand- then Slam down their response to up-end the opposition's case!

Follow us here and on twitter for breakdowns on all these new features in the coming days, and head over to Steam and Wishlist of the Devil today!
https://twitter.com/ofthedevilgame
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2739630/of_the_Devil/
